    Sin UI (ElvUI Edit) 

    Version: 9.0a
    by: schwalby [More]

    Hello Everyone -

    Here is my current version of the UI that I have been using since the xpac rolled out. There may be some kinks as I was trying to delete a bunch of profiles to release a few days ago and ended up copying over my profile. The how to videos below are good enough, but if you have any questions my discord is open: https://discord.gg/jnGWg35Mc5

    I did not include my interface folder, but I did include all of my addon profiles in the WTF folder.

    The main addons you want are:

    ElvUI - Must download and install in order for UI to work.
    Shadow&Light - Must download and install in order for UI to work.
    ElvUI_mMediaTag - Required for Tagging in Unitframes
    Details
    Plater
    Kaliel's Tracker
    Weakauras
    Farmhud
    Xct+


    Current 9.0 Gameplay


    SinUI Install Process UPDATED - Here is a video of things that can go wrong and how to fix them when trying to install.


    Updated the READMEPLS file - Please read it


    ---

    My goal was to utilize ElvUI as much as possible, with the fewest amount of outside addons possible. While still being able to obtain a vast amount of information in game.


    There is a small process to get it to load correctly. After spending two days trying to get the installer to work, there will be no installer. Please be sure to read the READMEPLS file. It will detail how to install properly.


    This download does not include ElvUI, ElvUI_Config, or Shadow & Light. Please see the readme file on where to find the correct link.

    Please note, I did not make any of these addons. Many thanks to all the wonderful authors who spend countless hours of work to enhance our hours of gameplay.

    If you have any questions, you can post on the addon or reach me on discord https://discord.gg/X2gPjzk


    Thanks!

    9.24.16
    1. Fixed issue with override bar for bar 1.
    2. Minor alignment adjustments.


    9.17.16 --Changelog for SIN UI 2.2
    1. Added some quality of life addons to the download
    2. Jumped on the minimap rep bar bandwagon, do you blame me?
    3. Updated Github link with imports.



    9.9.16 --Changelog for SIN UI 2.1
    1. Moved the Honor and Reputation bars to the bottom of the screen. They are set to mouseover. Moved minimap bar as well.
    2. Removed all WeakAuras from previous versions, created my own dynamic groups for Shaman/Priest/Monk. More to come in the future.
    3. Made some minor tweaks to unitframes.
    4. Due to xCT update created new profile for xCT.
    5. Created video for common issues when installing UI.


    9.3.16 --Changelog for Sin UI 2.0.2
    1.Turned off access to WeakAuras for now. They are still in there, but renamed so they do not load automatically.

    9.3.16 --Changelog for SIN 2.0
    1. Added correct READMEPLS file to .zip


    9.2.16 --Changelog for SIN 2.0
    1. Few minor tweaks to please my OCD
    2. Added a few addons -updated list in details.
    3. Added WeakAuras experiment.
    4. Updated github with import files.


    8.30.16-- Changelog for Sin UI 1.3
    1. Addressed overlap issue with Databar and Artifact bar.
    2. Updated most of the big addons
    3. Minor tweaks



    8.29.16-- Changelog for Sin UI 1.2
    1. Removed folders in \interface creating an issue with some LFG modules.
    2. Added a new profile named "CIN UI" - This is a different layout with the same style (As seen in gameplay clip).
    3. Added .txt file in download to import the new profile without having to reinstall entire UI.


    --------------------------------------

    8.26.16-- Changelog for Sin UI 1.1

    1. Added correct visibility state to Bar 1.
    2. Corrected issue with Vehicle bar loading.
    3. Adjusted default Master Volume to 25%.

    Created an extra profile named "In Plain Sight" - This profile forces all bars to be shown (Actionbars and Unit frames).
